en.contact_intro:
We are a team of experienced Physics teachers dedicated to making Physics easier to understand and more accessible.


This site features an audiobook-style video series that breaks down the IB Physics syllabus into manageable, engaging "bits"‚Äîideal for online learning and revision.


All videos are narrated by Fabi√°n Cherny, an IB Senior Examiner with over 25 years of experience in international exams.
